# Cyberpunk 2077 uevr Camera Configuration
# Generated by uevrInjector.exe baseline profile creation
# REDengine 4 Cross-Engine VR Adapter Camera Settings

# World Scale and Camera Parameters
world_scale=100.0
camera_height=1.7
camera_offset_x=0.0
camera_offset_y=0.0
camera_offset_z=0.0

# VR Camera Settings
vr_camera_enabled=true
vr_camera_scale=1.0
vr_camera_offset_x=0.0
vr_camera_offset_y=0.0
vr_camera_offset_z=0.0

# Decoupled Movement Settings
decoupled_pitch=true
decoupled_yaw=false
decoupled_roll=false

# Camera Smoothing
camera_smoothing_enabled=true
camera_smoothing_strength=0.5
camera_smoothing_delay=0.1

# REDengine 4 Specific Camera Settings
redengine4_camera_hook_enabled=true
redengine4_camera_matrix_extraction=true
redengine4_camera_transform_override=true

# VR Comfort Settings
vr_comfort_mode_enabled=true
vr_comfort_zone_size=0.8
vr_comfort_zone_fade=true

# Camera Limits
camera_pitch_min=-80.0
camera_pitch_max=80.0
camera_yaw_min=-180.0
camera_yaw_max=180.0

# Profile Information
ProfileName=Cyberpunk2077_Cameras_Baseline
ProfileVersion=1.0.0
ProfileDescription=Baseline Cyberpunk 2077 camera configuration for REDengine 4
ProfileCreated=2024-01-01
